ratio.desc: Aspect ratio for the content; If value is a String, then avoid using a computational statement (like '16/9') and instead specify the String value of the result directly (eg. '1.7777')
ratio.desc_cn: 内容的尺寸比；如果值是字符串，则避免使用计算语句（如“16/9”），而是直接指定结果的字符串值（如“1.7777”）

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
